mapper.insert: INSERT INTO alarm ( mem_id, step_order, status, ref_doc_id, read_yn, created_at ) VALUES ( #{memId}, #{stepOrder}, #{status}, #{refDocId}, #{readYn}, NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT d.form_code as formCode, d.doc_id as docId, d.doc_title as docTitle, m.mem_name as writer, d.status as status, l.step_order as stepOrder FROM approval_document d, approval_line l, member m WHERE 1 = 1 and d.doc_id IN (SELECT ref_doc_id FROM alarm WHERE 1 = 1 AND mem_id = #{loginId} AND read_yn = 'N') AND d.status != 0 AND l.mem_id = #{loginId} AND d.doc_id = l.doc_id AND d.mem_id = m.mem_id
